DOC.detailed_description: Insecticidal paint comprise two organophosphate ( OPs ) Insect Growth Regulator ( IGR ) . This tool target adult mosquito resistant pyrethroids reduce vector density . Larvicide new formulation Bacillus thuringiensis israelensis implement major permanent breeding site objective reduce vector density . Ivermectin inject domestic animal addition national campaign implement study area treat whole population . Ivermectin reduce survival mosquito blood feed treat human animal . Information , Education Communication strategy aim increase adherence population control tool available . Strengthening IEC aim increase good use long lasting net .
